snippet.title: The Last Islands of Man Trailer
snippet.description:
The Last Islands of Man is a retro rpg that forces you to manage your time. The waters are rising. Can you save yourself? Can you save your family? #RPGs #indiedev 
Available Now!

Features:

Story mode (few battles 1 hr gameplay)
Battle mode (challenging, 6-8 hr gameplay)
Active game time with a Timed challenge
Evolving and expanding maps
10 Classes with reactive team members
4 endings with character variations
500+ lines of dialog 
Male/Female Hero choice with 4 skins colors for each.

Custom Soundtrack from Monplaisir and John Bartmann 

https://facebook.com/tliom 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1477640/The_Last_Islands_of_Man/

A game by T.C. Forsdike
